chapter.title: Summary
chapter.para: As stated at the beginning of this document, the key goal of the EGT is to provide a way to interact with Guvnor repository resources in a local Eclipse workspace. While clearly there is a lot more that could be done, and no doubt there will be aspects of the current tooling that require revision going forward, we feel that the current state of the EGT is sufficient for the major use cases.
